    def c1, 1, 0, 9.99999975e-006, 100000
    def c3, -0.5, 2.82800007, 1, 1.5
    def c4, 0.00700000022, 0.00350000011, -0.360000014, 15
    def c5, 0.333999991, -0.666000009, 0.666000009, 0.333330005
    def c6, 0.333999991, 0, -0.333000004, 0.666000009
    def c21, 10, -0.0500000007, 3, 5
    def c22, 4, 0.300000012, 0.589999974, 0.109999999
    def c23, 14.9998999, 0.05859375, 0.234375, 0.0625
    def c24, 0.001953125, 0.0078125, 0.064453125, 0
    def c25, 2, -1, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.zw
    dcl_texcoord1 v1
    dcl_texcoord2 v2.zw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
    dcl_2d s3
    dcl_2d s4
    dcl_2d s5
    dcl_2d s6
    dcl_2d s7

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15


// Unreal light shaft fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --git --auto-fix-unreal-light-shafts --only-autofixed CRC32_2F7CDDA7_0.txt
texldl r7, c220.z, s15
mov r6, c14 // TextureSpaceBlurOrigin
mad r6.x, r7.x, c220.w, r6.x // Adjust each eye by 1/2 separation

    add_pp r0.xy, c3.x, v1
    mul_pp r0.zw, r0.xyxy, r0.xyxy
    mad_pp r0.zw, r0, -c3.y, c3.z
    mul_pp r0.zw, r0, r0
    mad_pp r0.zw, r0, -r0, c1.x
    log r1.x, r0.z
    log r1.y, r0.w
    mul r0.zw, r1.xyxy, c3.w
    exp_pp r1.xz, r0.z
    exp_pp r1.yw, r0.w
    mul_pp r1, -r0.xyxy, r1
    max_pp r2.x, r0_abs.x, r0_abs.y
    add r0.x, r2.x, c4.z
    mul_sat r0.x, r0.x, c4.w
    mad_sat r2, r1.zwxy, -c4.xxyy, v1.xyxy
    mad_sat r1, r1, c4.yyxx, v1.xyxy
    mul r3, r2.zwxx, c1.xxyy
    mul r2, r2.xyxx, c1.xxyy

    texldl_pp r3, r3, s0
    mad r4, r0.x, c5.xxyx, c5.z
    mov r5, c6
    mad r0, r0.x, r5.xxyz, r5_abs.wwyz

    mad r2, r2.zzxy, r0.zzyw, r3
    mul r3, r1.xyxx, c1.xxyy
    mul r1, r1.zwxx, c1.xxyy
    texldl_pp r1, r1, s0
    texldl_pp r3, r3, s0
    mad r2, r3.zzxy, r4, r2
    mad r0, r1.zzxy, r0, r2
    mul r1, c1.xxyy, v1.xyxx

    add_pp r0, r0, r1.zzxy

    max r1.yz, v1.xzww, c11.xxyw
    min r3.xy, c11.zwzw, r1.yzzw

    texld r3, r3, s5
    rcp r0.x, r4.w
    mul_sat r4, r0.x, r4.zzxy

    add r1.y, -r1.x, c1.z
    rcp r1.x, r1.x

    mov_pp r4.x, c0.x
    mad_pp r1.x, c2.x, r1.x, -r4.x
    mul_sat_pp r1.y, r1_abs.x, c0.y
    pow_pp r4.x, r1.y, c0.z
    mov r5.x, c1.x

    max_pp r1.y, c0.w, r5.y
    cmp_pp r1.z, -r1.x, c1.y, c1.x
    cmp_pp r1.x, r1.x, -c1.y, -c1.x

    mul_pp r1.x, r1.x, r1.y
    mul_sat r1.x, r1.x, c21.x
    mad_pp r0, r1.x, r0, r2
    add r1, -r0.yyzw, r3.zzxy
    add r2.x, r3.w, c21.y
    mul r2.x, r2.x, c21.z
    mov r2.w, c21.w
    mul r2.y, r2.w, c7.x

    mul_sat r2.x, r2.x, r3.x
    mad_pp r0, r2.x, r1, r0
    dp3_pp r1.x, r0.zwyw, c22.yzww
    mul_pp r1.x, r1.x, -c21.z
    exp_pp r1.x, r1.x
    mul_sat_pp r1.y, r1.x, c8.w
    mul_sat_pp r1.x, r1.x, c16.x
    texld r2, v0.zwzw, s1
    mul r2, r2.zzxy, c8.zzxy
    mul_pp r2, r2, c22.x
    mad_pp r0, r2, r1.y, r0
    mov r1.zw, c13
    mad r1.yz, v0.xzww, -r1.xzww, r6.xxyw
    dp2add r1.y, r1.yzzw, r1.yzzw, c1.y
    rsq r1.y, r1.y
    rcp r1.y, r1.y
    mul_sat r1.y, r1.y, -c3.x
    mov r2.xw, c3
    mad r1.z, c12.w, -r2_abs.x, r2_abs.w
    texld_pp r2, v0.zwzw, s2
    mul_pp r1.w, r2.w, r2.w
    mul_pp r2, r2.zzxy, c17.zzxy

    lrp r3.x, r1.w, r1.z, c12.w
    lrp r4.x, r1.y, c1.x, r3.x
    mul r1.x, c15.x, c15.x
    mul r1.x, r1.x, c15.x
    lrp_pp r3.x, r1.x, c1.x, r4.x
    mul_pp r0, r0, r3.x
    mad_pp r0, r2, c22.x, r0
    mad_pp r1.xyz, r0.zwyw, c10.y, c10.x
    rcp r2.z, r1.x
    rcp r2.w, r1.y
    rcp r2.xy, r1.z
    mul_sat_pp r0, r0, r2
    mul r1.xyw, r0.xwzz, c23.xzzy
    frc r0.x, r1.x
    add r0.x, -r0.x, r1.x
    mad r1.x, r0.x, c23.w, r1.w
    mad r0.x, r0.y, c4.w, -r0.x
    add r1, r1.xyxy, c24.xyzy
    texld_pp r2, r1, s7
    texld_pp r1, r1.zwzw, s7
    lrp_pp r3, r0.x, r1, r2
    texld r0, v2.zwzw, s4
    dp4_sat r0.x, r0, c20
    add r0.yzw, -r5.x, c19.xxyz
    mad r0.xyz, r0.x, r0.yzww, c1.x
    mov r1.x, c22.x
    mad_pp r1.xy, v2.zwzw, r1.x, c18
    texld_pp r1, r1, s3
    mad r0.w, r1.x, c25.x, c25.y
    mul r0.w, r0.w, c9.w
    mad_sat_pp oC0.xyz, r3, r0, r0.w
    mov_pp oC0.w, r3.w

// approximately 129 instruction slots used (18 texture, 111 arithmetic)
